=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Aladdin (Plus Bonus Features)
Review Date: 2017/11/02
Categories: Comedy, Animation, Dreamlike, Passionate
Product Description: ['Climb aboard the magic carpet in Disney’s animated masterpiece Aladdin, now part of the Walt Disney Signature Collection. Experience the timeless tale featuring Academy Award®-winning music (1992: Best Original Song, Best Original Score), nonstop action and unforgettable characters. Let Aladdin, Jasmine and the Genie show you a whole new world!']
